Articles.Content:
Some of the creations I have seen on here have been great so I thought I would post a couple of my own ships.

I have created a World space station and a research facility.

The WSS can Hold 8 Kerbals, It is Solar and Nuclear powered and can also works as a Mother ship or a refueling ship. At the moment I have a crew of 4 looking after it. I have fitted it with MapSat, MecJeb, a full Kethane system and a few other toys. The only part my picture does not show is the DSM Reactor and Ion drive. The Engine section looks very cool. If I get good feed back I will upload more pics.

At launch it is close to 900 Tons and has over 300 parts. I also put a lot of time in to creating the delivery system for the rocket and it fly's itself using MecJeb with no issues (Its very slow to turn).

My Research Center below can be used as a mining facility, Kethane storage facility or a refueling station. It also has the ability to land on Kerbin. It can house 18 Kerbs and comes with a DEMV and all the toys the WSS has. MapSat etc.... It can make it to Mun and land within 10 Hrs.

I also attached the Dynasat adapter to the DEMV. The one that doubles as a decoupler. Once you activate the DEMV and then the Adapter, It turns the DEMV from Debris into an actual ship so you can jump to it like a normal ship using the map or tracking station. Considering it size, it actually fly's like a small ship due to the way it is built and the way I managed to displace the weight of the ship. I also had to be very creative with the delivery system on this ship and is my largest build to date.

Thanks for checking out my ships and if anyone would like to use my ships or use the mas a base design. I would be more then happy to pass on the save files. I would like to thank the modding community, As my designs would not be possible without them and the guys who run and created KSP. fantastic game.

To use my ships you will need MecJeb, DSM pack, DEMV, MMI satellite pack, Kethane pack and all the relevant plugins.

Edited October 16, 2012 by sal_vager

These Ships look amazing.But I have to ask by Kethane storage facility and refueling station Do you mean it refuels Kethane and refuels other ships with Kethane or that it refuels ships with liquid fuel and just holds Kethane.
